heading: Fast Speeds
paragraph: The next-generation Ri 1000 prints full-color 10-inch x 8-inch graphics on light garments in less than 28 seconds.

heading: Sharp, Vibrant Images
paragraph: Wow your customers with eye-popping prints. With a high-accuracy carriage and table, minimum ink drop size of 3 pL, precise table height adjustment, and dressable platens, the Ri 1000 delivers beautifully crisp, high resolution images up to 1200 x 1200 dpi.

heading: 'Walk-Up' Ready With Automated Maintenance
paragraph: The Ri 1000 is the only walk-up ready DTG printer in the industry. While other DTG printers require frequent maintenance, the Ri 1000 saves time by automating white ink agitation, self-cleaning functions, and continuous monitoring of ink supply and air levels. For maintenance functions that are not automated, the Ri 1000â€™s built-in Interactive Operation Guide alerts users, sending them reminders to complete necessary tasks. The result is a printer that is low-maintenance and ready to print at any time.

heading: Built-In Interactive Operation Guide With Smart Alerts
paragraph: To make maintenance even easier, the Ri 1000 features a built-in Interactive Operation Guide. Accessible through the machine's spacious 7" touchscreen display, the interactive guide provides smart alerts reminding you when to perform routine manual maintenance tasks. Recognized for these cutting-edge features, the Ri 1000 direct-to-garment printer earned its designation as a RED HOT Technology in 2019.
